/* selectSchList */ SELECT IFNULL(TSS.SCHM_SEQ,'') AS schmSeq, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_SEQ,'') AS schSeq, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_TITLE,'') AS schTitle, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_CONTENT,'') AS schContent, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.START_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.END_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i') AS endDate, IFNULL(TSS.ALL_DAY_YN,'') AS alldayYn, IFNULL(TSS.CREATE_SEQ,'') AS createSeq, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSS.MODIFY_SEQ,'') AS modifySeq, CASE WHEN TSS.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSS.MODIFY_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate,
IFNULL(TSSU.CDE_SEQ,'') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(TSSU.CDE_TYPE,'') AS cdeType, IFNULL(TSSU.CAL_SEQ,'') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSSU.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE,'') AS schPartitionType, IFNULL(TSSU.SCH_AUTORITY,'') AS schAutority,
IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TITLE,'') AS calTitle, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TYPE,'') AS calType, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_CONTENT,'') AS calContent, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_COLOR,'') AS calColor
FROM T_SC_SCH TSS
INNER JOIN (SELECT DATE_TSS.SCHM_SEQ, DATE_TSS.SCH_SEQ FROM ( SELECT TSS.SCHM_SEQ, TSS.SCH_SEQ FROM T_SC_SCH TSS WHERE 1 = 1 AND (TSS.START_DATE_YEAR = #{sch.year} AND TSS.START_DATE_MONTH = #{sch.month})
UNION ALL
SELECT TSS.SCHM_SEQ, TSS.SCH_SEQ FROM T_SC_SCH TSS WHERE 1 = 1 AND (TSS.END_DATE_YEAR = #{sch.year} AND TSS.END_DATE_MONTH = #{sch.month})
UNION ALL
SELECT TSS.SCHM_SEQ, TSS.SCH_SEQ FROM T_SC_SCH TSS WHERE 1 = 1 AND (
(TSS.START_DATE_YEAR <= #{sch.year} AND TSS.START_DATE_MONTH < #{sch.month}) AND (TSS.END_DATE_YEAR >= #{sch.year} AND TSS.END_DATE_MONTH > #{sch.month})
) ) AS DATE_TSS GROUP BY DATE_TSS.SCHM_SEQ, DATE_TSS.SCH_SEQ ) AS UNION_DATE_SCH ON TSS.SCHM_SEQ = UNION_DATE_SCH.SCHM_SEQ AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = UNION_DATE_SCH.SCH_SEQ
INNER JOIN T_SC_SCH_USER TSSU ON TSS.SCHM_SEQ = TSSU.SCHM_SEQ AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = TSSU.SCH_SEQ AND TSSU.CDE_SEQ = #{emp.empSeq} AND TSSU.CDE_TYPE = 'E' AND TSS.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSSU.USE_YND = 'Y'
INNER JOIN T_SC_CAL TSC ON TSSU.CAL_SEQ = TSC.CAL_SEQ AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'
WHERE 1 = 1
AND TSSU.CAL_SEQ IN #{cal.calSeqs}
